title: Flipped Learning-BOPPPS Integrated Education for Enhancing Intercultural Communication Competence

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and foundational understanding of multicultural environments
context.additional_context: A course for managers/leaders in global leadership roles within corporations, focusing on developing intercultural communication strategies applicable to real-world work settings

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three major conflict cases in intercultural communication and propose resolution strategies.
Learners can produce a communication manual considering cultural differences while conducting team projects based on flipped learning materials.
Learners can improve communication competencies by at least 20% through peer assessment and self-reflection during BOPPPS model feedback sessions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
